title: IThickenFeatureData.FeatureScope
description: Gets or sets whether to use scope for the thicken feature in a multibody part.
returns: When: true, only the specified bodies in the multibody part are affected by the thicken feature false, all of the bodies in the multibody part are affected by the thicken feature
remarks:
The thicken feature is expanded along the plane on which the feature is created and affects all or only the specified bodies it intersects.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
